name: Learning to Count Clutch - No. 3053
description:
Very stylish and vintage looking clutch! This fantastic piece is great for a fun night on the town, with plenty of space for wallets, cell phones and everything else we try to cram in our handbags! It's dressy enough to go out, but it can also be used for a quick run to the grocery store, when all you need is a "few things". These clutches also make great make-up bags or pencil cases and they are perfect for gift-giving, whether it's Christmas or a wedding party gift.

Bonus - And the rosettes can be removed and pinned onto anything else, like another bag or even wear them as a brooch! So versatile!

Plus, it's ready to go... No waiting for it to be made!

Materials:

Exterior - Cotton/Polyester Twill
Interior - 100 % Cotton
Lining - Heavy-weight interfacing
Frame - Nickel-free
Rosettes - 100% Cotton, with felt on the back and a pin (removable)

Specs:

L - 8" (along the top)
L - 9" (along the bottom)
H - 3.75"
D - 1.5"

Care Instructions:

Spot clean, do not dry clean, let air dry.

name: Noir Tote Bag No. 1037
description:
The Noir Tote Bag No. 1037 is the perfect bag for zipping off to where ever your life takes you. There is plenty of room for all of things we know end up in our bags. Whether it's a textbook or a lunch, even a makeshift diaper bag for the day or sometimes a laptop. The interior pockets make it easy to find your little items, like your cell phone or chapstick.

Plus, it's ready to go... No waiting for it to be made!

Materials:

Exterior - Cotton/Polyester Twill
Interior - 100% Cotton
Heavyweight interfacing throughout to allow bag to keep it's shape
Magnetic snap closure
Two interior pockets for knick-knacks and doo-dads

Specs:

H - 13.5"
W - 13.5"
D - 2"
Straps have a 10" drop and are 1" wide
Double and tripled stitched in stress points to ensure it can take what you dish out

name: Nautisch Pencil Case No. 2016
description:
Pencil cases are not only great for kids and teens, but for adults! They are the perfect size for all your small items, such as make-up and toiletries or loose change and cash. Just slip it into your travel bag or handbag and go.


Plus, it's ready to go... No waiting for it to be made!

Materials:

Exterior - 100% Cotton (Navy, yellow and white)
Interior - 100% White Cotton

Zipper closure

Specs:

H - 3.75"
W - 7.75"
Zipper is double topstitched to ensure durability from plenty of "zip" use! Seams on the inside are covered as well for a professional look.

Care Instructions:

Machine wash, gentle cycle cold, can be thrown in the dryer on low and iron if needed.
